title: Steph Set To Break A Record, Pacers' Future
description:
Briand Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Dave McMenamin and Kirk Goldsberry to discuss the historic record Steph Curry is set to break, LeBron leveling up his play, what direction the Pacers will move in going forward and positive COVID tests in the NBA.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
